Great idea! A cockpit needs some post-its with notes scattered around. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I really like these new IVAs, but the lab doesn't look so much like a lab as it does a logistics module. Don't get me wrong, I do like it, but I think something along the lines of [**this (bottom picture on the linked post)**](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92764-90-Stock-Part-Revamp-Update-1-7-2%21?p=1394207&viewfull=1#post1394207) would be more suited to the purpose.

Nice work, though ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
When in IVA mode we should be able to add sticky notes and write on it (through Jeb of course).

I'd like to see all the parts have their size bumped up a few % as they are rebalancing anyway. The devs should take a kerbal in a helmet, and bump all parts bigger until they can fit through the hatch. That or slightly shrink the helmets just until they fit. It's a TINY change, but I'd like to see it. Those cabin IVA should have helmets someplace, at least a couple.

> That bug is fixed in the final version. I just didn't update the screenshot.

I noticed the water pipe runs into the oxygen pipe on the other floor and the oxygen pipe runs into the water pipe. Was this an intentional kerbal error? I think because the floors appear to have been flipped.

All the IVAs look fantastic by the way.
These are looking grat! Glad to see they're being fleshed out for 1.0.

That horizontal IVA is pretty cool too (EDIT: Ven stated he hates it, lol)...I'm still hoping maybe two Science Lab parts in the future, one vertical for Skylab style orbital labs, and one with a horizontal IVA like in that picture for surface ops. I'm no coder, but I imagine it wouldn't be that much more memory usage since they both share external part geometry and textures. They might need part-specific arrows on the outside saying: "this side up" ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif)
